articles.author: Carla Johnson
articles.title: Mass layoffs are underway at the nation’s public health agencies - AP News
articles.description: Employees across the massive U.S. Health and Human Services Department received notices Tuesday that their jobs were being eliminated, part of a sweeping overhaul designed to vastly shrink the agencies responsible for protecting and promoting Americans’ healt…
